name: Smart Games for Kids
description:
In My Amusement Park, kids step into the driver’s seat to run their own amusement park. In Digging for Dinosaurs, kids will separate fact from myth to learn the true tales about 21 different dinosaurs. With these smart games, parents can rest assured that kids build skills while they play.

MY AMUSEMENT PARK:

Build the Park: Choose from four different theme park plans then build rides, food venues and special attractions to

open your theme park!

Fix the Rides: Customers don’t like broken rides! Use your logic skills to repair the rides and keep the customers happy.

Keep It Going: Running an amusement park isn’t all about rides and games. Use matching clues to fulfill food orders, keep the park clean and more!

Earn Money: Play eight different memory and puzzle games to earn money to build a bigger, better park with larger and more expensive rides and attractions!

Make It Your Own: Control the look of the park—from its theme to the design of the rides to the landscaping and decorations.

DIGGING FOR DINOSAURS
Digging Adventures: Unearth 21 different dinosaurs from the ferocious Tyrannosaurus Rex to lesser-known dinosaurs like the featured Microraptor in simulated paleontological digs!

Fun Facts: Earn dinosaur cards with each dinosaur discovered. Each card gives players stats on the dinosaur including its geologic period, eating habits and more!

True-to-Life Games: Eight different mini-games give players knowledge on surviving as a dinosaur.

Hall of Dinosaurs: Display dinosaur finds in the museum’s Hall of Dinosaurs and savor the rewards of each legendary discovery.

Leveling Options: Choose between three levels of gameplay that provide age-appropriate adventures for younger players and challenging games for advanced players.

Features

o 4 theme park plans and 21 digging adventures
o 15 rides & attractions & 21 different dinosaurs
o 8 logic and puzzle games and 8 factual mini-games
o 3 levels of play in each game
